nodes.bodyText:
Since we're adding this table, (which we should've always had), we should probably also list spring.cloud.gcp.credentials.location, spring.cloud.gcp.credentials.encoded-key, spring.cloud.gcp.project-id, and spring.cloud.gcp.credentials.scopes.
I understand that's not the main focus of this PR. So, I would be OK with it being done in a separate PR.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -24,6 +24,15 @@ dependencies {
 }
 ----
 
+=== Configuration
+
+The following options may be configured with Spring Cloud core.
+
+|===========================================================================
+| Name | Description | Required | Default value
+| `spring.cloud.gcp.core.enabled` | Enables or disables GCP core auto configuration | No | `true`

nodes.bodyText: I filed a follow-up issue #2151 for this.

nodes.bodyText: Better to do it in a separate PR connected to the new issue #2151 , I guess.

nodes.bodyText: We should also add it to spring-cloud-gcp/spring-cloud-gcp-autoconfigure/src/main/resources/META-INF/additional-spring-configuration-metadata.json.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -40,8 +41,10 @@

  */
 @Configuration
